data.name: Goat's Tale 2
data.detailed_description:
Goat's Tale 2 is a game in the genre of precise platformers and is a continuation to the very well-received first part (over 40k downloads and 84% positive reviews on Steam!). As in the predecessor, the main goal of the player is to get to the top, but thanks to completely new mechanics and improved physics, this task should be a little easier.

Review


- New Mechanics
Many new mechanics have been added to the game, such as, for example, elevators with which our brave goat can move in 4 directions. Or special rock ledges that you can grab to slide down easily without bouncing off the walls.



- World Exploration
Goat's Tale 2 is much more exploring than its predecessor. At each stage, you can find buried treasures or npcs who will advise you on how to overcome more difficult jumps and give you a penny for your help.



- Challenge your friends
The local competitive mode, known from Goat's Tale Plus, also returns to the game, in which the player can take part in duels for who will get the most points.

Goat's Tale 2 is:


  • A new bigger adventure.

  • Even more addictive gameplay.

  • Great music.

  • Competition with friends.

  • Beautiful pixel art graphics.

  • A challenge only for the best players.

data.short_description: The Goat is back in his next adventure! The challenge will be difficult, but only with your help he will be able to get to the top.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Atom N2100 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 3.40Ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7650A
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio
